forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 38F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 41F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 28F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 39F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the evening. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the evening. Low 31F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 36F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
